api_key.title: Api Key
api_key.description: An environment client-side or server-side API key. Sent to the Flagsmith API as `X-Environment-Key` HTTP header to authenticate the request.

EnvironmentEvaluationContext.title: EnvironmentEvaluationContext
EnvironmentEvaluationContext.description: Environment context holds information about the environment relevant to flag evaluation.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the feature for which the evaluation is being performed.

FeatureEvaluationContext.title: FeatureEvaluationContext
FeatureEvaluationContext.description: Feature context can be specified to filter for a specific feature.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The identifier of the user for which the evaluation is being performed.

traits.title: Traits
traits.description: A set of traits for the user for which the evaluation is being performed. The keys are the trait names.

IdentityEvaluationContext.title: IdentityEvaluationContext
IdentityEvaluationContext.description: Indentity context holds information about an identity for which the evaluation is being performed.

transient.title: Transient
transient.description: Whether the trait is transient. Transient traits are used for evaluation, but not persisted.

TraitEvaluationContext.title: TraitEvaluationContext
TraitEvaluationContext.description: The context for an individual trait.

name.title: Name
name.description: Application name. Sent to the Flagsmith API as `X-Customer-Application-Name` HTTP header.

version.title: Version
version.description: Application version. Sent to the Flagsmith API as `X-Customer-Application-Version` HTTP header.

ApplicationEvaluationContext.title: ApplicationEvaluationContext
ApplicationEvaluationContext.description: Application context holds information about the application that initialises the SDK.

environment.description: Set environment context to override the default environment API key set in the SDK configuration.

identity.description: Set identity context so that the SDK can evaluate flags for a specific identity using identity traits, segments, and overrides.

feature.description: Set feature context to filter for a specific feature or features. Not supported by all SDKs.

application.description: Set application context to override the default application name and version set in the SDK configuration. Not supported by all SDKs.

title: FlagsmithEvaluationContext
description: Flagsmith evaluation context is used to hold all the information required to evaluate feature flags by any given SDK and provided it to the Flagsmith SDK API.
